thread.title: The Horseman: Gujarati producer-director to direct a French movie | Gujarati Movie News
thread.title_full: The Horseman: Gujarati producer-director to direct a French movie | Gujarati Movie News - Times of India

author: Ano Patel
title: The Horseman: Gujarati producer-director to direct a French movie | Gujarati Movie News
text:
Jakee Patel has had a number of hits in the Gujarati film industry recently. After Shikaar, Shikaar 2 and Strangers on Whatsapp, the popular director-producer is all set to add another feather to his cap.
Well-known French novelist Natalie Mutzel 's recent novel - The Horseman - is all set to turn the novel into a film. And what's more, the movie will be shot in Ahmedabad, and will be directed by Gujarati director Jakee Patel.
Natalie spoke about how she always felt a deep association with the state and its culture. This will probably be the first time when most of a Hollywood film will be shot in the city. The movie will be shot at Gandhi Ashram and other locations in Ahmedabad as well as in Delhi and Goa.
